intent_atoms.description: Add macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults once the XCTest UI hooks land, ensuring the tree/detail panes update end-to-end during live parses.
The tree/detail panes must update end-to-end during live parses after adding macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults.
Execute the Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics on a platform that ships Combine, keeping throughput parity with the CLI harness.
Latency metrics must be captured and throughput parity maintained between macOS UI benchmark and CLI harness.
Surface global logging and telemetry toggles once streaming metrics are exposed to the CLI.
Route export operations to streaming capture utilities as they migrate from ISOInspectorCLIRunner.

functional_units.name: macOS SwiftUI automation for streaming selection defaults
functional_units.description: Automates the default selection of streaming options in the macOS SwiftUI UI and updates tree/detail panes during live parses

functional_units.name: Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS
functional_units.description: Executes a benchmark to capture latency metrics for Combine-based UI while maintaining CLI throughput parity

functional_units.name: Global logging and telemetry toggles for CLI streaming
functional_units.description: Provides global controls to enable or disable logging and telemetry when streaming metrics are exposed in the CLI

functional_units.name: Routing export operations to streaming capture utilities
functional_units.description: Redirects export operations from ISOInspectorCLIRunner to new streaming capture utilities
